messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Parenting a Free Child
messages.msgSnippet: ... capitalizing on your work the way they are. Maybe you could just list your book on Amazon with theirs? **I finally did that - thanks :o).  If anyone wants
messages.messageBody:
>>Have you emailed them? I don't think it's cool tht they are
capitalizing on your work the way they are. Maybe you could just list
your book on Amazon with theirs?

**I finally did that - thanks :o). If anyone wants to put a customer
review there, I'd appreciate it. Here's the address:

http://www.amazon.com/Parenting-Free-Child-Unschooled-Life/dp/1411641558
/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8
<http://www.amazon.com/Parenting-Free-Child-Unschooled-Life/dp/141164155
8/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1204589846&sr=1-1>
&s=books&qid=1204589846&sr=1-1

I did have to charge more due to Amazon's fees, though, so send your
friends to http://www.freechild.info/.

~Rue
<http://www.etsy.com/shop.php?user_id=5055314>

-----Original Message-----
From: DJ250 <dj250@...>

That's so odd! I got a copy for much less than that. Not sure if I
bought it
on Amazon. Maybe order it through Barnes and Noble or Borders and then
go pick
it up at the store. It's GOTTA cost less!

-=-=-=-

Better: Order directly from Rue!

www.freechild.info

Only $14 plus shipping. (and all the $$ goes directly to the author!)

BARGAIN!

BARGAIN!

~Kelly, biggest fan


Kelly Lovejoy

----- Original Message -----
From: kbcdlovejo@...
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 28, 2008 11:02 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Parenting a Free Child


I usually say that this book is worth its weight in gold....

but I hopped on over to see what kind of price tag Amazon had on the
book to get the comment that it was "outrageously expensive."

Here, from Amazon:

**********************

Parenting A Free Child: An Unschooled Life (Paperback)
by Rue Kream (Author)
No customer reviews yet. Be the first.

Availability: Available from these sellers.

1 used & new available from $91.00

********************

It's listed at $91.00!!!

Rue! You must be making a KILLING! When does Jon quit his job??!! <g>

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

messages.subject: Re: Parenting a Free Child
messages.msgSnippet: Hey they descreased it from $99 this morning! I emailed them to ask if it was a mistake and they said it wasn t - that it was priced that way cuz it was out of
messages.messageBody:
Hey they descreased it from $99 this morning! I emailed them to ask
if it was a mistake and they said it wasn't - that it was priced that
way cuz it was out of print and the "only other place to get it" was
on a UK site for $300+ in U.S. dollars. I figured they were full of
it. Glad to know I can get it from the author rather than some rip-
off artist. lol

Tara
